author: Staff Reporter
text:
The final electoral rolls released for the district by Collector T.P. Rajesh here on Thursday has a total of 14,41,110 voters.

There are 131 persons of the third gender; 7,07,750 women voters; and 7,33,229 men voters.The rolls has included 37,766 new voters.

The final electoral rolls would be displayed at the Collectorate, office of the Electoral Registration Officer, office of Assistant Electoral Registration Officer, Town Panchayat offices, panchayat union offices, and 998 voting booths here in the district.The new voters will be issued the Electors Photo Identity Cards on the National Voters Day on January 25.
title: 14,41,110 voters in Krishnagiri
